pr_title: [IOTDB-578] Cluster module should use the same thrift version with io…

timeline.message: [IOTDB-578] Cluster module should use the same thrift version with iotdb-parent

timeline.bodyText:
I think we can only remove the version here.
In the parent pom, the libthrift is claimed in dependencyManagement, rather than dependencies.
timeline.author: jixuan1989

replies.bodyText:
@jixuan1989 the cluster module is dependent on service-rpc, and service-rpc module has the libthrift dependency which version extends from parent. So we don't need to add the libthrift dependency to cluster module separately.
service-rpc/pom.xml

 <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.thrift</groupId>
            <artifactId>libthrift</artifactId>
</dependency>
replies.author: vesense
